replies.body:
Feeling pretty good about this patch riot.
Some key champions have been addressed, and of course there's always more one can do, but for what you have tweaked in this patch it looks good. 

Interested to see how new Ryze plays out, Irelias E distance nerf was needed, but damn sylas -70% dmg on minions with his passive?
Its like the only good source of wave clear, other than his q of course. 
Time to practice morde!
Edit, sylas is pretty damn strong in the jungle.
I read Dragonslayer Ornn {{champion:516}} and got excited {{sticker:sg-janna}}
Yo thanks for buffing my 60% wr supports c u all in challenger
Aaaand Riot just gutted every champ I just picked up last patch. Ryze nerfed to shit, and Sylas waveclear destroyed. At least I finally have Morde
Rip old death cap, made me laugh.... ill still be banning Mord every game :P

Hi, the default ward bug has been here for a lot of patches. Are there any chances that Riot Team can fix that bug? Basically, while in champ select, when we pick the default ward skin and it switches back to the previous ward after a few seconds. I hope that you guys can fix this annoying bug.

Yuumi's missle (Q) is still semi bugged. 
Have had multiple times it hasn't followed cursor. 

Also, these are all good works and all, but when are you fixing matchmaking?
YOOOOOOOOO its the 14th now, give me my Jhin skin please
Good job riot for letting Morde go through pbe :D {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
look i love shaco, but did he really deserve a darkstar skin? it doesn't make much sense thematically.
What a well thought-out comment, really agreed with all your points and reasonings {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
